Question: In 1983, this person underwent a second round of heart surgery to correct the previous bypass surgery.
Hints: In January 1970, this person won his second Grand Slam singles title at the Australian Open.
This person and his doctors believed he contracted the virus from blood transfusions he received during his second heart surgery.
In the early 1980s, this person contracted HIV from a blood transfusion he received during heart bypass surgery.
